profile: HOTWIRE ELECTRIC 416-553-5533 PLEASE EMAIL info@hotwire-electric.com http://www.casaguru.com/web/hotwire-electric-all-inc Twitter: @hotwire2001 HGTV FIND A PRO: http://www.hgtv.ca/findapro/details/?business_id=32279088&project_name=home%20renovation&service_name=electrical&location=Vaughan,Ontario&search_id=17033160664 Website: www.hotwire-electric.com For over 10 years, we have successfully designed and provided quality electrical services and solutions to our clients. From custom homes to potlight installations and everything in between such as panels and service upgrades, Hotwire Electric-All can meet your electrical needs. We have build our reputation on quality workmanship and impeccable customer service. Coupled with personalized electrical design and advise to suit each individual client. At Hotwire Electric, our certified electricians are 110% committed to serving our clients with great service, honesty, and most important integrity. We offer a full spectrum of services for residential homes and commerical sites, from small projects to large. We strive to be efficient, neat and organized. We ensure our customers’ satisfaction from beginning to end. From basic electrical wiring to high-end lighting design, home automation and million dollar custom homes we insist on paying attention to detail and providing superior workmanship every step of the way. For us, no job is too big or too small Contact us for a quote today and see the Hotwire difference in your project! We offer our residential and commercial services 7 days a week. Contact us for your free estimate on your electrical projects. Hotwire Electric-All in is a fully insured and an authorized electrical contractor with the Electrical Safety Authority. Check out esasafe.com to view our listing. Solid Build Interiors Inc is a unique family run contracting company with an overall experience of 35 years in the industry. Communication is our key focus in providing high quality work in making our valued customers ideas come to life. step by step walk throughs are offered to help provide expertise and knowledge in design for our customers. We in, Solid Build Interiors Inc, believe that quality of work should be provided no matter the magnitude of the task. Expertise in bathroom remodelling, basement renovations, and as well as kitchen makeover, provided with licensed electrician and plumber. We hope you choose us to help you with your next big remodelling mission.  


Please call, 647-830-9649. For a visit to organize a free quote. We can’t wait to hear your amazing ideas.

profile:
Thank you for looking at our profile.  We are working hard to achieve first-class ratings with Homestars.  We have been in the construction and home renovation business for years, and have recently signed up with Homestars. 

We treat all customers like family, and our motto is... "Do it right the first time..."

The INTEGRITY PROPERTY GROUP GIVES you our assurance that our professional installation crew will be friendly, neat and courteous as they complete your on-site installation and we clean up when we’re through. If you have any questions or needs that we might help you with please give us a call any time.”

We want to earn your business...!  Our business is based on reviews and referrals...

We are located in central Peterborough, however, we can handle jobs within a one hour radius, which would include a good part of cottage country (Kawartha's) and also Durham region, as well as part of Northumberland County.

It would be our pleasure to provide you with a free quote, to understand the scope of the work required, and to give you professional services.

Our specialties include the following;

* Deck Design and Installation
* Fence & Gate
* Pergola Design and Installation
* Building Sheds / Cabanas
* Landscape and Interlock
* General Home Renovations

Thank you for looking at our profile and we hope that we have the opportunity of working with you and your family on your next project.
